    • getBufferedImage

      public BufferedImage getBufferedImage()

    • copy

      public void copy(Picture p)
      Replace the given picture with the current picture.

      For example:

      pic1.copy(pic2);

      replaces pic1 with pic2.

      Note that this is the only effective way of changing the dimensions of an image.

      Parameters:
      p - The picture to replace the current picture with.

    • getPixel

      public Pixel getPixel(int row, int col)
      Get the pixel at the given x and y coordinates of the image.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the desired pixel
      y - The y coordinate of the desired pixel
      Returns:
      The pixel at the given x and y coordinates.

    • setPixel

      public void setPixel(int row, int col, Pixel pixel)
      Replaces the pixel at the given x and y coordinates with the given pixel
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the pixel to be replaced
      y - The y coordinate of the pixel to be replaced
      pixel - The pixel with which to replace the pixel at the given coordinates.
